::Zeus/Killer/Striker::

Zeus flies into the battlefield, ready to kill as always. He picks out his 
target, an owl attacking his brother Ares. He straightens his wing, launching 
out two missiles at Shadow Wing.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Killer runs into the battlefield, firing at Striker.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Striker flies forward as a shot hits him in the back. He stands up, turning 
around and firing at Killer.
